tutorial1: on mobile tap the arrows to move in the corresponding direction. Moon button to time swap, cursor arrow button to interact. Top left to fullscreen and top right to mute/unmute
on desktop w to jump, a for left, d for right (Extremely Limited CAN'T COMPLETE GAME)
desk: It is day 482, and I have come to the realization that the most crucial part of Project Moon’s development is..well..not here with me. I have to travel to the Corvus facility to retrieve it, but hopefully I will be back soon for Lune’s awakening.
dogTreats: There's jar of dog treats. Unfortunately, you can not eat them, but maybe something else can
crate: Lune steps forward and opens a crate as Sol jumps out, barking at the stranger. You give it a dog treat in hopes of befriending it and find a new hidden power to switch to the past.
keycard: You found a key card. This can be useful.
brokenCon: The console is broken, can't do anything with it
workCon: The console turns on and it drops a steel beam to make a bridge
finalCon: As you touch the console a light envelops you
endScrene: Day 987: Lune, if you find this message, then you will grow to be disappointed upon my absence. Ever since you came into this world, I knew you would grow the heart to look for your creator. I established that in you. However, after I have learned that the state of this world has fallen, I had to create something to take care of Sol.
